characters.name: Violet Sorrengail
characters.voice_seed_prompt: Young adult American female, alto range, breathy texture with high clarity. Quick intelligent speech with underlying anxiety and determination. Slightly faster pacing when stressed. Studio quality recording.

vocal_characteristics.speech_patterns: Quick, precise, academic delivery. Tends to speak faster when nervous. Emphasis on logical arguments.

characters.personality_mood: Intelligent and determined, physically fragile but mentally strong. Often defensive but fiercely loyal.

characters.name: Xaden Riorson
characters.voice_seed_prompt: Young adult American male, deep baritone, commanding presence with controlled intensity. Measured deliberate pacing. Occasional dark humor. Low resonant tone with slight gravel. Professional recording.

vocal_characteristics.speech_patterns: Deliberate, controlled delivery. Strategic pauses. Commands without raising voice. Occasional dry humor.
vocal_characteristics.accent: Neutral American with slight urban edge

characters.personality_mood: Dangerous, intelligent, protective. Hides vulnerability behind authority.

characters.name: Rhiannon Matthias
characters.voice_seed_prompt: Young adult American female, warm alto, friendly supportive tone with occasional fierce protectiveness. Moderate pacing with casual cadence. Girl-next-door quality. Studio recording.

vocal_characteristics.speech_patterns: Conversational, supportive delivery. Quick to laugh. Fierce when defending friends. Natural cadence.

characters.personality_mood: Loyal friend, fierce protector, practical and grounded.

characters.name: Dain Aetos
characters.voice_seed_prompt: Young adult American male, tenor voice, earnest concerned tone with protective edge. Moderate pacing. Slight tension when stressed. Professional recording.

vocal_characteristics.speech_patterns: Earnest, concerned delivery. Tendency to be protective/patronizing. Formal when in command role.

characters.personality_mood: Protective, rule-following, conflicted between duty and care.

characters.name: Narrator
characters.voice_seed_prompt: Adult American female, warm alto with clear articulation. Professional narrator quality. Even pacing with emotional range for dramatic moments. Engaging storytelling tone. Studio quality.

vocal_characteristics.speech_patterns: Professional narration, even pacing, clear enunciation. Emotional variation for dramatic moments.

characters.personality_mood: Professional narrator with ability to convey emotion without overacting.
